MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the FK7 postcode area of Stirling. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 6pm. Our engineers have arrived on site and are investigating the cause of the fault.  Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 9pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:55 PM on Tuesday, 20 October 2020.
